faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about our organic honey and hive products
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our products

q1.question: Where does your honey come from?
q1.answer: Our honey comes directly from hives located in the Kabylie mountains, Algeria. We work with local beekeepers who share our values of quality and tradition.

q2.question: Is your honey really organic?
q2.answer: Yes, all our honeys are certified organic. No pesticides or chemical additives are used in our hives. We guarantee a 100% natural and pure product.

q3.question: What's the difference between jujube and eucalyptus honey?
q3.answer: Jujube (sidr) honey is sweeter with fruity notes, while eucalyptus has a stronger taste and soothing properties for the throat. Each honey has its own benefits.

q4.question: How should I store honey?
q4.answer: Store your honey in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight. Honey never expires but may crystallize over time, which is a sign of natural quality.

q5.question: Is crystallized honey still good?
q5.answer: Yes, crystallization is a natural phenomenon for pure honey. To liquefy it, place the jar in warm (not hot) water until it returns to its liquid consistency.

q6.question: What are the delivery times?
q6.answer: Deliveries usually take 2-4 business days for Algiers and 3-5 days for other cities. You will receive a tracking number to follow your order.

q7.question: Can I return a product?
q7.answer: Yes, you can return a product within 14 days of receipt, if it's unopened and in perfect condition. Contact our customer service to initiate a return.

q8.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q8.answer: We accept payments by credit card, CIB, and cash on delivery. All payments are secure.

faq.contact_us_description: Our customer service is available to answer all your questions.

livraison.title: Delivery
livraison.description: Information about delivery of our organic honey throughout Algeria
livraison.subtitle: We deliver your favorite honey throughout Algeria
livraison.pickup_desc: Come collect your order from our pickup point

packaging.title: Secure Packaging
packaging.description: All our products are carefully packaged to ensure delivery in perfect condition. We use appropriate protective materials.

timing.title: Delivery Hours
timing.description: Deliveries are made Monday to Saturday, between 9 AM and 6 PM. A time slot can be arranged upon request.

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.description: You will receive a tracking number by email as soon as your order is shipped to track your package in real time.

retours.title: Returns & Refunds
retours.subtitle: Your satisfaction is our priority
retours.policy_intro: At Suqya, we are committed to offering you products of the highest quality. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, here is our return policy.
retours.condition1: The product must be returned in its original packaging, unopened and in perfect condition.
retours.condition2: The return request must be made within 14 days of receiving the product.
retours.condition3: The product must be accompanied by proof of purchase (invoice or receipt).
retours.condition4: Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility, unless the product is defective or an error was made on our part.
retours.deadline_description: You have 14 calendar days from the date of receipt to inform us of your intention to return a product.
retours.step1_description: Send us an email at contact@suqya.dz with your order number and reason for return.
retours.step2_description: Our customer service will send you a confirmation email with return instructions.
retours.step3_description: Carefully package the product in its original packaging and include a copy of the invoice.
retours.step4_description: Send the package to the address indicated in the confirmation email. Keep the delivery receipt.
retours.refund_method1_desc: Refund to your original payment method within 5-7 business days of receiving the return.
retours.refund_method2_desc: Exchange for another product or store credit for future purchases.
retours.exceptions_description: Opened products, damaged by the customer, or perishable products cannot be returned for hygiene and safety reasons.
retours.contact_description: Our customer service is available to help you with any questions regarding returns and refunds.
retours.help_description: Don't hesitate to contact us if you have questions or need assistance.

cgv.title: Terms and Conditions
cgv.description: Suqya's terms and conditions of sale
cgv.subtitle: Sales conditions applicable to all our products
cgv.intro: These terms and conditions of sale (T&Cs) govern the contractual relationship between Suqya company and any customer purchasing products through our website.

article1.title: Article 1: Purpose
article1.content: These T&Cs aim to define the conditions under which Suqya sells and delivers its honey and derivative products to customers.

article2.title: Article 2: Products
article2.content: All our products are organic honeys and hive products, harvested and packaged in Algeria. The main characteristics of the products are presented on the site.

article3.title: Article 3: Prices
article3.content: Product prices are indicated in Algerian dinars (DZD) and include all taxes. Delivery fees are calculated separately and displayed before order validation.
article3.vat: VAT included according to applicable Algerian legislation

article4.title: Article 4: Orders
article4.content: Any order placed on our site constitutes a firm and definitive purchase offer. Order validation entails acceptance of these T&Cs.
article4.confirmation: An order confirmation will be sent by email immediately after validation.

article5.title: Article 5: Payment
article5.content: Payment can be made by credit card, CIB or on delivery. Transactions are secured through our approved payment partner.
article5.security: All banking information is encrypted and not stored on our servers.

article6.title: Article 6: Delivery
article6.content: Delivery is made to the address indicated by the customer when ordering. Delivery times are 2-5 business days depending on the region.
article6.timeline: The customer will be informed of order shipment by email with a tracking number.

article7.title: Article 7: Right of Withdrawal
article7.content: In accordance with Algerian legislation, the customer has a period of 14 days to return an unsatisfactory product, provided the product is in a resalable condition.
article7.conditions: The product must be unopened, in its original packaging and accompanied by proof of purchase.

article8.title: Article 8: Warranty
article8.content: Our products are guaranteed against any manufacturing defect. In case of a defective product, we commit to replacing or refunding it.
article8.limitations: The warranty does not cover damage resulting from improper use or storage.

article9.title: Article 9: Intellectual Property
article9.content: All elements of the site (texts, images, logos) are the exclusive property of Suqya and are protected by intellectual property rights.
article9.restrictions: Any reproduction or unauthorized use is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action.

article10.title: Article 10: Liability
article10.content: Suqya's liability is limited to direct damage resulting from a product defect. Suqya cannot be held liable for indirect or unforeseen damage.
article10.force_majeure: Suqya will not be liable in case of force majeure or events beyond its control.

article11.title: Article 11: Disputes
article11.content: In case of dispute, the parties will endeavor to find an amicable solution. Failing that, the dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Algiers.
article11.jurisdiction: This contract is governed by Algerian law.

article12.title: Article 12: Modification
article12.content: Suqya reserves the right to modify these T&Cs at any time. Modifications will take effect upon publication on the site.

cgv.questions_description: Don't hesitate to contact us if you have questions about our terms of sale.

confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
confidentialite.description: How we protect and use your personal data
confidentialite.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority
confidentialite.intro: This privacy policy describes how Suqya collects, uses and protects your personal data when you use our website and purchase our products.
confidentialite.company_name: Data controller company: Suqya SARL, Algiers, Algeria

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.content: We collect personal data that you voluntarily provide when registering, placing orders or communicating with us.

types.title: Types of data collected:
types.personal: Identification data (name, first name, email, phone)
types.payment: Payment information (processed by our secure partner)
types.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, etc.)

purposes.legal_desc: Comply with our legal and tax obligations
purposes.marketing_desc: Inform you about our news and special offers

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.
data_protection.measures: Your data is encrypted during transmission and stored on secure servers.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

types.title: Types of cookies used:
types.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand site usage

third_parties.title: Sharing with Third Parties
third_parties.content: We do not sell or rent your data to third parties. We only share your data in the following cases:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with Algerian law, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We keep your data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, in accordance with applicable legislation.

international.title: International Transfers
international.content: Your data is stored and processed in Algeria. We only transfer your data outside Algeria with your explicit consent.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: This privacy policy may be updated periodically. We will inform you of any important changes by email or through our site.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any question about this privacy policy or exercising your rights, contact us:

about.title: Our Story
about.description: Discover the story of Suqya, your source of authentic organic honey from Algeria

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Suqya is the story of a passion for authentic honey and a commitment to quality and tradition.

story.title: From the hive to your table
story.paragraph1: Everything began in the Kabylie mountains, where our family has practiced beekeeping for three generations. Honey was part of our daily life, a treasure we shared with our loved ones.
story.paragraph2: Faced with the difficulty of finding authentic honey on the market, we decided to create Suqya (ÿ≥ŸèŸÇŸäÿß) - an Arabic word meaning 'to nourish' or 'to water'. Our mission: to bring the best of Algerian honey directly to you.
story.paragraph3: Today, we work with over 10 partner beekeepers in different regions of Algeria, each bringing their unique expertise and exceptional honey varieties.

2020.title: The Beginnings
2020.description: First harvest in the Kabylie mountains. A family passion becomes a project.

2022.title: Expansion
2022.description: Partnership with 10 local beekeepers. Organic certification obtained.

2024.title: Suqya is Born
2024.description: Launch of the online store to share our honey with all of Algeria.

2025.title: Today
2025.description: Over 500 satisfied customers and a growing community of honey lovers.
